segments.text: I wish our competition will quit poaching our people , when Susan resigned last week to work for the Sunburst , she was our fourth employee to leave us for them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you ever considered that perhaps we have a morale problem among our employees ? If everyone is discontent with their work , of course they won't stick arround .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , those do leave will soon find out the grass isn't as green on the other side of sense as they thought it was , I know Sunburst is suffering from inbreeding .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Inbreeding is a big drawback from snitching most of their employers from one or two companies .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: With Susan leaving , we should probably look to someone new on board .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Our human resource department is working on it , it's not easy to recruit new employees every few month , it's hard to find qualified people .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe we should start shopping around the competitors people .
segments.speaker: S1
